responsibilities: Own, plan, and optimize the AI behind Enterprise customer’s deepest technical problems
Leverage SGP to build advanced AI agents with multimodal functionality and tool-calling
Gather business requirements and translate them into technical solutions
Meet regularly with customer teams onsite and virtually, collaborating cross-functionally
Push production code in multiple development environments, writing and debugging code in both customer’s and Scale’s codebases
Multi-task and learn new technologies quickly
qualifications: Ability to solve deeply complex technical problems with ambiguity using state-of-the-art research and AI
Proficiency in Python to write, test, and debug code using common libraries (e.g., numpy, pandas)
Experience working with cloud technology stack (e.g., AWS or GCP) and developing machine learning models in a cloud environment
Strong knowledge of software engineering best practices
Familiarity with state-of-the-art LLMs and their strengths/weaknesses
analysis: The job responsibilities include leveraging SGP to build advanced AI agents with multimodal functionality and tool-calling, which suggests working with Generative AI. Additionally, the skills section mentions familiarity with state-of-the-art LLMs and their strengths/weaknesses, indicating that the job involves working with language models. The combination of these responsibilities and skills strongly suggests that the job involves working with both Generative AI and language models.
